title: Self-Directed Mathematics Learning Design Utilizing Learning Activity Visualization and Reflection Support

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and basic digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: Learners are office workers (administrative/managerial) with beginner-level mathematical expertise, operating in an environment where they perform project-based assessments using digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can visualize their mathematics learning activities using xAPI-based log data.
Learners can analyze learning patterns through visualization tools and derive concrete evidence when writing reflective journals.
Learners can improve self-directed learning strategies based on comparative activity data with peer learners.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
